Class Location

java.lang.Object
  




public class Location
extends greenfoot.Actor

The Location is each invidivual tile on the grid. It can have different states that allow for differences in its image and function. Each scene has a different image.

Version:
June 2018
Author:
Maggie Lin, Catherine Lee

          Creates a location based on its scene and state.

Constructor Detail

Location

public Location(int x,
                int y,
                char state,
                char scene)
Creates a location based on its scene and state.

Parameters:
x - Length of tile
y - Height of tile
state - State of tile (1: obstacle, p: path, a: empty1, b: empty2, s: start, f: finish)
scene - Scene of tile(u: underwater, f: fire, g: grass)
Method Detail

public char getState()
Get state of location.

Returns:
char State of location (1: obstacle, p: path, a: empty1, b: empty2, s: start, f: finish)

Set state of location.
